m_szDocTitle: BMW Hydrogen Fuel Cell car only in 2023 - Indian Cars Bikes
m_szDocSumamry: BMW Hydrogen Fuel Cell car only in 2023 by sourabh on January 18, 2016No Comments        BMW has been pioneers in bringing many tehnologies to cars, but Hydrogen Fuel Cell will not be counted amongst those for sure. And this has come from none other than vice-president  of drivetrain research, Matthias Klietz. “There will be nothing whatsoever from the Toyota and BMW partnership in production next year or 2017,” Klietz admitted during the Detroit motor show. “2019 is probably the best bet for that, and that’s the normal development cycle. But it will be somewhere between 2020 and 2025 from the
